[ library(graph_algorithms) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

node_to_nodename(+Graph, +Node, -NodeName)

Retrieves the name of a node
Graph
a graph structure
Node
an integer node number
NodeName
ground data, usually node name

Description

Fail Conditions

Fails if no node name information is available

See Also

nodes_to_nodenames / 3, nodename_to_node / 3, nodenames_to_nodes / 3
